data.description: Build line and bar graphs from templates
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SVG::TT::Graph uses Template Toolkit's complex generation
    metalanguage and is quite complex to work with. SVG::Template::Graph
    provides an easier way to generate arbitrary graph data using
    easy-to-understand SVG templates which can completely separate
    content from styling.
